rows.EXPERT REVIEWER — FULL SPEC: Not a 30-minute call. A real review engagement. 10-20 hours per cluster.
WHAT THE EXPERT ACTUALLY DOES
Phase 1: ORIENTATION (2-3 hrs)
• MC records a conversation with the expert about their domain (general knowledge capture)
• Expert reads the Planning tab and Industry Perspectives tab for each model in their cluster
• Expert flags obvious gaps before AI draft is produced
Phase 2: REVIEW (5-10 hrs)
• Expert reads through every tab in every model in their cluster
• Expert marks: CORRECT / WRONG / INCOMPLETE / MISLEADING on each tab
• Expert provides specific corrections (not just 'this is wrong' but 'it should say X')
• MC records a follow-up conversation: 'What did you find? What surprised you? What's wrong?'
Phase 3: VERIFICATION (3-5 hrs)
• Expert reviews revised models after Claude incorporates feedback
• Expert signs off on V-tab (Verification sheet) for each model
• Expert grades overall cluster quality: A/B/C/D/F
• MC records final conversation: 'Are we good? What would you change? What grade do you give?'
Total: 10-20 hours spread over 2-4 weeks.
This is NOT a phone call. This is a professional engagement.
COMPENSATION
Options (expert chooses):
A. FLAT FEE: $200-500 per model reviewed (total $800-4,000 per cluster)
Best for: consultants who value cash, practitioners with day jobs
B. EQUITY: 0.5-1% per cluster reviewed
Best for: people who believe in the project, want long-term upside
C. HYBRID: Reduced flat fee + equity
Best for: most people
D. ATTRIBUTION ONLY: No cash, no equity. Name on published models + MC interview content.
Best for: people building personal brands who value the credibility artifact
This is the zero-budget option. It works for people who are already paid well
and want the portfolio piece, not the money.
Note: At $0 budget, we lead with D and C. After raise, we can retroactively compensate.
EXPERT GRADING RUBRIC
Grade
A
rows.col_2: Production-ready. Minor edits only. Expert would put their name on this today.
rows.col_3: Lock the model. V-tab goes green.

rows.EXPERT REVIEWER — FULL SPEC: B
rows.col_2: Good but needs work. 80% right. Specific improvements identified.
rows.col_3: Claude revises. Expert re-reviews. One more cycle.

rows.EXPERT REVIEWER — FULL SPEC: C
rows.col_2: Mediocre. Framework is right but details are wrong or missing.
rows.col_3: Major revision. Claude + PM co-founder rework. Expert re-reviews.

rows.EXPERT REVIEWER — FULL SPEC: D
rows.col_2: Poor. Fundamental misunderstandings. Needs significant rework.
rows.col_3: Flag to Nilo. May need different expert or different approach.

rows.EXPERT REVIEWER — FULL SPEC: F
rows.col_2: Wrong. Dangerous if used. Would embarrass the project.
rows.col_3: Delete and restart. Expert helps rebuild from scratch.
